title: Basic
description: This schema defines basic common types that are used by other schemas.

number.description: A numeric type that includes integer or floating point numbers.

uuid.description: Unique id used to identify an entity.

email.description: Email address of a user or other entities.

timestamp.description: Timestamp in Unix epoch time milliseconds.
timestamp.@comment: Note that during code generation this is converted into long

href.description: URI that points to a resource.

duration.description: Duration in ISO 8601 format in UTC. Example - 'P23DT23H'.

date.description: Date in ISO 8601 format in UTC. Example - '2018-11-13'.

dateTime.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Example - '2018-11-13T20:20:39+00:00'.

timezone.description: Timezone of the user in the format `America/Los_Angeles`, `Brazil/East`, etc.

entityLink.description: Link to an entity or field within an entity using this format `<#E::{entities}::{entityType}::{field}::{arrayFieldName}::{arrayFieldValue}`.

fullyQualifiedEntityName.description: A unique name that identifies an entity. Example for table 'DatabaseService.Database.Schema.Table'.

sqlQuery.description: SQL query statement. Example - 'select * from orders'.

jsonSchema.description: JSON schema encoded as string. This will be used to validate the JSON fields using this schema.

entityExtension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.

providerType.description: Type of provider of an entity. Some entities are provided by the `system`. Some are entities created and provided by the `user`. Typically `system` provide entities can't be deleted and can only be disabled.

componentConfig.description: key/value pairs to pass to workflow component.

status.description: State of an action over API.

sourceUrl.description: Source Url of the respective entity.

style.description: UI Style is used to associate a color code and/or icon to entity to customize the look of that entity in UI.

color.description: Hex Color Code to mark an entity such as GlossaryTerm, Tag, Domain or Data Product.

iconURL.description: An icon to associate with GlossaryTerm, Tag, Domain or Data Product.
